text: [[col:green]]【Forged from the remelted fragments of iron bricks from the Great Bastion】[[/col]]\\n\\nThis unit belongs to the Northern Provinces. They are elite troops capable of both melee and ranged combat, possessing superior combat qualities and requiring higher upkeep costs.

[[col:green]]【Recast from the gilded flakes fallen from the Tower of Ashshair】[[/col]]\\n\\nThis unit belongs to the Western Provinces. Clad in alchemical armor, they excel in maintaining slow and heavy formations to accelerate the flow of the Winds of Magic.

[[col:green]]【Reshaped from the remnants of the hull of the Jade Sea treasure ships】[[/col]]\\n\\nThis unit belongs to the Eastern River Lords. They are equipped with an array of vintage firearms, focusing on firepower to overwhelm enemies before they close in.

[[col:green]]【Reforged from the embers of the candelabras of the Phoenix Temple】[[/col]]\\n\\nThis unit belongs to the Burning Wind Nomads. They value mobility and guerrilla tactics, adapting effectively to the harsh southern environments.
Setting up a firing position takes considerable time, but the boost to range and accuracy is well worth the effort.

Increased powder load allows for triple-barrel volleys, rapidly enhancing firepower at the cost of barrel durability. However, such overloading cannot be sustained for long, requiring gunners to make timely decisions.
